title: The Unrelated Murders
description: When a young girl gets strangulated - Rembrandt Bouwmeester never guesses the chain of sinister events which are to follow. But as his friends slowly start to go missing and several others die, no one feels safe anymore. No one, but Kage. He seems to be the only one who understands the seemingly unrelated links and knows the terrifying truth of who's next.***Winner of Juggernaut SELECTS Program 2019***Give it a read on the Juggernaut website & app!
author: Granthana Sinha
